natlang.rdg.surfacerealizer
Class RelationTransformer

java.lang.Object
  natlang.rdg.surfacerealizer.RelationTransformer
All Implemented Interfaces:
LibraryConstants, RDGTransformer
public class RelationTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
implements RDGTransformer, LibraryConstants

This class transforms a rhetorical dependency graph into one or more dependency trees, which may be connected by a cue word

recursiveDepthFirst

public void recursiveDepthFirst(RSVertex node)

Parameters:
node -

transform

public boolean transform()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Transforms the Rhetorical Dependency Graph, by first transforming the relation(s) at the bottom and adding conjunctions. Then adjuncts are added in order to show the relations BETWEEN sentences. Finally a cue word may be added to the left most dependency tree in the graph to show the relation to the previous paragraph.

Specified by:
transform in interface RDGTransformer
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the relation cannot be transformed to one or more RSDepTreeModels

transformDepthFirst

public void transformDepthFirst(RSVertex node,
                                RSVertex par,
                                java.lang.String label)
Transforms the tree depth first and tries to combine the dependency trees at the bottom. Doing this it adds cue words which represent the relations WITHIN sentences, such as omdat, nadat

Parameters:
node -
par -
label -

transformDepthFirst2

public void transformDepthFirst2(RSVertex node,
                                 RSVertex par,
                                 java.lang.String label)
Transforms the tree depth first and adds cue words to dependency trees in order to express rhetorical relations BETWEEN sentences (such as daarom, daarna)

Parameters:
node -
par -
label -

transformFinalRelation

public void transformFinalRelation(RSVertex node)
Adds a cue word to the very first dependency tree of the paragraph if the graph contains a cue word that represents the relation to the previous paragraph. This can be achieved by adding the cue word (such as daarom, daarna) to the leftmost dependency tree in the graph.

Parameters:
node -
